Description:
Enviable Entertainer with Pool and Spa
This enviable entertainer is set to suit buyers seeking a sensational family oasis. With every imaginable feature and a key location near Bayswater Station, Mountain High Shopping, Bayswater South Primary, and Bayswater Secondary, this is an impressive property to retreat to at the end of every day.
The hub of this home is the kitchen with quality shaker cabinets, freestanding SS cooker, and ample pantry space. Overlooking the dining area and lounge with warm wood fire and French doors to the garden, this property is perfect in every season. With a second living area, sizeable bedrooms, and updated baths including claw foot tub, this property possesses features of a forever family home.
The garden is equally deserving of acclaim and is designed for fabulous living. With an in-deck swimming pool, gazebo, and simply stunning covered alfresco with privately positioned spa, every element collates to create this outstanding outdoor space.
Bonus features include ducted heating and cooling, double garage, and roller door carport.
Whether your plans are to happily host gatherings or secure a sensational home with privacy, this property has it all. Inspection will impress.
ONLINE AUCTION - Saturday 10th October at 11am
Insights: 43 Sasses Avenue, Bayswater VIC 3153 was last sold in 2020 and 5 other 5 bedroom house in Bayswater have recently been sold.

Description:
Approved plans and permits for 3 modern townhouses!
Promising approved plans and permits to build 3 ultra-modern townhouses on an expansive 1044 sqm (approx.) of prime time Croydon land, this exceptional opportunity is a developers dream in a location just moments to picturesque parklands and terrific schools!
All the hard work has been done for you with townhouse plans and permits already ticked off by the council! On a sizeable flat block with very little trees, developers will love building the new residences, with plans allowing for one 4 bedroom townhouse and two other 3 bedroom townhouses. Each townhouse has a considered layout over two levels, and delivers generous proportions and amazing versatility. The current dwelling also comes with a secure lease for buyers who dont want to build straight away and can enjoy excellent rental returns!
Croydon locations dont get much better than this Diane Crescent address, which has you so close to Esther Park with sporting facilities and the Bushy Creek Trail, Manchester Primary School, Mooroolbark College, Barngeong Reserve Kindergarten, Mooroolbark Terrace Shopping Centre, buses, and Mooroolbark Station.
Insights: 60 Diane Crescent, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2010.

Description:
DOUBLE BLOCK, DOUBLE OPPORTUNITY WITH UPSIDE
Opportunities to purchase such a large under developed piece of land are hard to come by and there's no disputing the immense appeal of this property. On a double block with two separate titles offering an expansive 3,036sqm site, you have an array of options from residential medical and other commerical uses.
With a massive 66m frontage, this is the kind of sizeable allotment developers crave with the opportunity to build your chosen multi-unit site development (STCA).
The possibilities are truly endless for one lucky buyer, develop the land and achieve a substantial return in the meantime for this immaculately maintained residence. The home itself has huge potential with multiple living spaces across lounge and dining, combined kitchen and meals, sunroom, family room topped off with a rumpus adjoining the double garage. Four bedrooms are serviced by dual system heating/cooling, two large water tanks and solar panels.
It's the chance of a lifetime to develop and capitalise on a prime location moments from Heathmont Train Station, Eastland Shopping Centre, the Eastlink plus local shops and schools.
From all of us at Hudson Bond Real Estate, we wish you every success in your search for your home. If you would like more details on this home or to chat about one of the other properties we have please call 9840 7700 or email us today.
Do you need to sell before you buy? Ask about our Smart Sale process.

Description:
Love the lifestyle.
Just a short stroll from vibrant cafes, restaurants and boutique shops; this delightful two-bedroom property enjoys a striking street presence with its contemporary colour palette and rendered façade. Whether it's a low-maintenance home or superb addition to an investment portfolio, the prized central position makes it a highly-valuable proposition with Ringwood Secondary College, Aquanation, Ringwood & Heathmont Train Stations, Great Ryrie Primary School, Eastland, Heathmont shopping strip and EastLink all within easy reach.
An attractive single-level retreat, the light-bathed interiors feature polished hardwood floors that extend throughout the open plan living and dining zone, connecting to the modern kitchen that comprises stainless-steel appliances including a gas cooktop and dishwasher. Created for casual entertaining, the easy-care courtyard features custom-built seating and a timber bar area where you can enjoy a quiet drink with friends.
Two bedrooms comprise built-in robes and are serviced by a sleek main bathroom that boasts full-height tiling, shower, WC and laundry facilities. Complemented by a communal decking area perfect for those large gatherings and BBQ's, split-system cooling and a single carport, this neatly presented property is set amid a small block of homes and provides a desirable, well-connected lifestyle.
Insights: 1/2 Campbell Street, Heathmont VIC 3135 was last sold in 2015 and 14 other 2 bedroom unit in Heathmont have recently been sold.

Description:
All offers to be in by Tuesday 6th October at 12pm
Immaculate & convenient location
This 2 bedroom home appeals to those buyers who are discerning and looking for a light and airy spacious low maintenance property in which to reside. Freshly painted inside and modern updates to kitchen and bathroom, you will be pleasantly surprised. On entry you will be impressed by the gleaming floor tiles, leading to the light filled separate formal living room with dual aspect windows. On the other side of the entry is the Master bedroom suite, with a dual sided walk through wardrobe leading to the gleaming bathroom featuring a separate bath/shower, a well-lit vanity and separate toilet. The rear bedroom also features large spacious built in robes. The central hub of this home is the well-designed chefs kitchen with gas hot plates, electric under bench oven, a dishwasher, all of which have recently been updated for todays buyer. The generous sized breakfast bar provides a great place for casual dining and the tiled dining/family area will accomodate a large dining table and provide many fabulous moments. This room has direct entry to and overlooks the rear garden and decking area all on its own title of 273m2 approx. Car parking is available in the remote single garage, being located within walking distance to Ringwood East shopping strip and train station. Eastland, Eastlink and central Ringwood are right around the corner; be quick to inspect as it wont last long.
Insights: First listed on 28 September, this unit has been on Domain for 22 days. 45 other 2 bedroom unit in Ringwood East have recently been sold.

Description:
Under Offer
IMPORTANT INFORMATION - *COVID-19 Response Strategy*
We recognise people still need to buy, and we want to help make this possible by providing a safe environment for everyone.
During this time we are not conducting public opens however we WELCOME private viewings to qualified buyers.
Please contact Michael McKenney on 0421 211 319 to arrange a private inspection.
One Valma Street presents to the market a spacious and conveniently laid out home, with family living at the forefront of its design.
Occupying a sensational and opportune location atop a sprawling 714m2 (approx.) block, this unique, updated home delivers a fantastic opportunity for anyone wanting a spacious, elegant, family friendly home, in an elusive pocket of Bayswater.
The well-proportioned layout provides plenty of space for the entire family, boasting a formal entry, large formal lounge/dining area, a separate well-appointed gourmet kitchen featuring stainless steel Blanco appliances, a family/meals area and an enormous rumpus room. As well as five bedrooms including a master with full ensuite and walk-through robe, a fully renovated bathroom that is conveniently located between the secondary bedrooms and an abundance of storage throughout.
Adding to what is an already impressive abode is the home cinema/soundproof studio, that can be found at the rear of the double garage, something that not many homes possess! Continuing the family friendly theme, there is plenty of front and back yard area, for those fun-filled days with family and friends.
Bonuses include new ducted heating, three split system air conditioners, plantation shutters, abundance of storage, private and peaceful court setting, and so much more, all designed with comfort in mind.
Sitting atop over 700m2 of land within close proximity to all amenities, including Our Lady of Lourdes primary school, newly updated Bayswater shopping precinct, restaurants, cafes, Bayswater train station and the major road arterials such as Eastlink, this one is simply a must see.
Opportunities of this stature seldom become available in todays market, only an inspection can truly reveal the magnitude of what is being offered.
If youre wearing socks, prepare to have them blown clean off!
Proudly marketed by Knox's Number 1 Agency
Thinking of selling? Call us today; Boronia office on 9761 2277, Wantirna office on 9800 1225, Rowville office on 9755 6666, Bayswater office on 9720 3030 or Ferntree Gully office on 9752 2889.
TO REGISTER YOUR INTEREST click on either of the following tabs and fill in your details, BOOK AN INSPECTION on the Biggin & Scott website or EMAIL AGENT / CONTACT AGENT on Real Estate.com.au and other websites. You will be contacted by one of our agents and will also receive a text advising of inspection times.

Description:
Stylish Unit in the Heart of Croydon
Offering first home buyers, investors and downsizers an exciting opportunity, this three bedroom unit is superbly located walking distance to Croydons popular shopping strip, cafés, restaurants and train station. Set in lush garden surrounds on a low maintenance 387sqm (approx.) allotment, it features a generous open-plan living/dining area and an open kitchen boasting a stainless-steel oven/cooktop and sleek benches The bedrooms are spacious with the master featuring a walk-in robe and ensuite, while the remaining beds include built-ins and share a sparkling central bathroom with separate WC. Complete with heating and cooling plus a single lock-up garage with internal access, this exceptional home demands your attention. Conveniently located near quality schools, parkland and bike paths with easy access to EastLink and the Eastern Freeway.
***PhilipWebb Real Estate Coronavirus Update***
The health of our valued clients and staff is our highest priority. Please note the following changes to our open for inspection processes as we navigate the current Coronavirus (COVID-19) situation.
Inspections are strictly by appointment only. Please register your contact details to arrange a private inspection with the listing agent
Attendees are limited to one agent and one prospective purchaser, who may be accompanied by one other person (either an existing household member or intimate partner) and their children under 18 years old if there are no appropriate alternative care arrangements available
Please maintain safe social distancing of 1.5m from anyone in attendance including PhilipWebb staff
Face masks must be worn at all times
Avoid touching surfaces including fittings and fixtures within the property
Hand sanitiser is provided
We kindly ask that you refrain from attending an inspection if you:
Are experiencing flu-like symptoms
Have tested positive to, or have recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
Have recently travelled overseas or have been in direct contact with someone who has
Were all in this together and we thank you for your understanding.

Description:
A PRISTINE HOME ON A SUBDIVIDED CORNER BLOCK
It is clear that this home on a subdivided corner block has been beautifully maintained throughout its life and with its very clean and largely original style, you can find instant comfort or choose to update, renovate and personalise it to suit your taste while adding significantly to its value. The position is the first of many positives here with 2 primary schools, and buses close by with central Bayswater's shops, cafes and train station all just minutes away. Fronted by a classic orange brick façade and a double carport, the home features a generous lounge with gas heater as well as an adjoining dining room and a timeless Blackwood kitchen with electric oven/stove and a dishwasher. There are 3 bedrooms including the main bedroom with a built in wardrobe plus the bonus of a fully renovated family bathroom with separate toilet. Ducted heating and an air conditioner are also included for additional comfort and outside there's a lovely front garden and a north facing rear courtyard with a covered patio.
Insights: 1 Yarran Grove, Bayswater VIC 3153 was last sold in 2020 and 71 other 3 bedroom house in Bayswater have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Friendly Court!
Prepare to fall in love with this beautifully presented home situated on a generous block of approximately 794sqm in a quiet court. You'll feel immediately at home as soon as you step inside!
This large home boasts a family friendly floorplan with beautiful polished hardwood floors and fresh, neutral tones throughout. The master bedroom is zoned towards one side of the home, with walk in wardrobe and its own ensuite. Two additional bedrooms with built in robes plus study or fourth bedroom are serviced by the family bathroom featuring a bath for the kids and a separate toilet for extra convenience. There are two separate living areas including a formal lounge room and open plan family room with wood heater adjoining the fully appointed kitchen and dining area.
Double doors from the family room lead out to the elevated outdoor entertainment area that's perfect for family gatherings and weekend barbeques. The secure, private backyard offers space for children and pets to run around, and there's plenty of garden for the green thumbs.
All this, plus the comfort and convenience of ducted heating, evaporative cooling and ducted vacuuming. Completing the package is a oversized double garage with roller door with an additional single carport at the rear perfect for additional car, boat or caravan accommodation. The convenient location is close to a range of schools, shops, bus services, restaurants and cafes, as well as easily accessible to both Westfield Knox Shopping Centre and EastLink. Call now!
Proudly Marketed By Harcourts Boronia. Photo ID Required At Inspections.
Insights: 5 The Haven, Bayswater VIC 3153 was last sold in 2020 and 34 other 4 bedroom house in Bayswater have recently been sold.

Description:
Family comfort opposite serene park.
Set behind a charming picket fence and offering a tranquil view of the adjacent park, beyond the appealing exterior, this comfortable three-bedroom home delivers a light filled and relaxing atmosphere underpinned by a list of appreciable appointments throughout.
The enduring quality of this triple-fronted abode has withstood the test of time and promises to respond to your every need. Step inside and be greeted by the spacious lounge showcasing neutral tones and the warmth of polished floorboards that result in an undeniably comfortable and welcoming interior-a theme echoed throughout.
The home continues to impress with a well-equipped kitchen. Conveniently located adjoining the meals area and an absolute pleasure to work in, features include; stainless steel Chef electric oven, gas stove, dishwasher, large corner pantry, abundant bench space, tiled splashback and LED lights.
Good-sized bedrooms are rare, but this home accommodates well. The large master is fitted with a triple built-in robe while the additional two robed bedrooms are located off the same L-shaped hallway. The bathroom offers a relaxed space for quiet contemplation, incorporating a separate bath, shower, corner vanity and adjoining toilet.
Devoted to ensuring all the needs of a busy couple or family are met, the home conveniently provides; keyless entry, separate tiled laundry, gas ducted heating, air-conditioning, decorative wall panelling, enclosed front yard, low-maintenance rear courtyard and a generously-scaled covered entertaining area.
This home is situated only a short walk from McAdam Square Shopping Centre, Lipscombe Park Reserve, Ainslie Parklands Primary School, The Good Shepherd Primary School, Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar. Mullum Mullum Creek Trail is at the end of the road and the home is also within close proximity to Croydon Railway Station, tennis courts, hospitals, Eastlink freeway and Croydon Memorial Pool.
A rare opening exists to acquire this spectacular property that not only caters to all your needs, but offers a uniquely beautiful location.
Insights: 30 Highland Avenue, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020 and 184 other 3 bedroom house in Croydon have recently been sold.

Description:
Triple opportunity for family or investors
A unique opportunity ideally suited to extended families and investors, this quiet allotment houses a 2-3 bedroom home with 2 bedroom unit/home office which will help to offset the mortgage, all on the same title on this leafy Croydon street. A charming weatherboard with hardwood polished floors and original ceiling roses and cornices boasts street frontage. Displaying 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, master zoned on entry with chic rainfall ensuite and main bathroom with large corner bath indulgence.
Open plan design encompasses living, dining and a vibrant high-end European integrated fire, requiring minimal maintenance and delivering maximum efficiency. Matched with a stylish kitchen with s/s oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. Host guests on a front verandah with covered area or back decking linking to a separate studio with bed/living, smart bathroom with BI laundry and rainfall shower, brand new soft-close kitchen with electric cooker, dishwasher and breakfast bar. Next door to a self-contained 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom (2 WCs) unit with living and kitchen disability compliant with ramp and railings. All dwellings have a large common garden.
An ideal arrangement for families with older parents/inlaws, university students or children saving for a house. It also represents a great opportunity to lease 1 or all 3.
Walk to restaurants and cafes and minutes to Burnt Bridge and McAdam Square shops plus a range of quality schools incl Kalinda PS, Good Shepherd PS, Yarra Valley GS, Rudolf Steiner School, Luther College and Melba College. Buses depart at the top of the street with great connections to Croydon Station. Explore the nearby Mullum Mullum Trail on foot or atop a bike and ride to Eastland and Town Square for a weekend brunch. Minutes to freeway and Eastlink and a leisurely drive to the Yarra Valley wineries.
The main house additionally, offers split system heating cooling, laundry, 3kw solar roof panels, a repointed and resprayed roof and off-street parking for 3 cars.
The studio and unit have polished floorboards, separate electricity meters and split system heating/cooling and the unit additionally offers a separate gas meter, side gate access and is currently leased for $300 PW.

Description:
The PERFECT home!! You've found it!!!
Please follow us on Facebook, YouTube, LinkedIn and Instagram for regular fresh content search "Babet Brothers Real Estate".
Ladies and Gentleman, do we have an amazing opportunity for you today, perfect for both first home buyers, investors, down sizers or young families and located in an excellent location and a short distance to shops, schools and reserves. LOCATION.TICK!!
Resting on a good sized 464m2 block the home itself features 3 great sized bedrooms and a decent yard, simply PERFECT.
This home has it all and features lovely hardwood floors throughout. The living area is generous in its proportions and features a good sized functional kitchen with plenty of bench top space and freestanding stainless steel oven and cooktop. There is also a walk in butlers pantry! How good is that!
The kitchen overlooks the dining area so that you can be right there in the action with family and friends whilst preparing your meals.
The home has heating to keep you warm in winter and air conditioning to keep you cool in summer.
The home presents extremely well, you will love it. There is nothing to spend. Simply pack your things and move straight in.
Location, location, location.everything is either a short drive or walking distance away!
-Eastland shopping centre
-Schools
-Reserves/Parkes
-Train station
-Local shops
Dont miss out. This home will sell fast. Contact the Babet Brothers today to avoid missing out!
Contact Deej Babet on: 0403 247 200
Contact Matt Babet on: 0401 861 185

Description:
Vacant Land - Plans to Build 2 Single Storey Dwellings
This is a unique opportunity to either build your brand new dream home or take advantage of the current permits which have been approved for building 2 side by side single-storey 4 bedroom Metricon Homes.
With a wide street frontage of 20.73m and a depth of 41.76m, this block will suit the construction of a wide range of new homes.
Topped off with a location which has you within close proximity to the heart of Croydon and Mooroolbark, opportunities like this one don't come onto the market very often.
Insights: 81 Lincoln Road, Croydon VIC 3136 was last sold in 2020.
